pinecone.label: Pinecone
pinecone.description: Upsert embedded data and perform similarity or mmr search using Pinecone, a leading fully managed hosted vector database

recordManager.label: Record Manager
recordManager.description: Keep track of the record to prevent duplication

fileUpload.label: File Upload
fileUpload.description: Allow file upload on the chat

pineconeTextKey.label: Pinecone Text Key
pineconeTextKey.description: The key in the metadata for storing text. Default to `text`

topK.label: Top K
topK.description: Number of top results to fetch. Default to 4

fetchK.label: Fetch K (for MMR Search)
fetchK.description: Number of initial documents to fetch for MMR reranking. Default to 20. Used only when the search type is MMR

lambda.label: Lambda (for MMR Search)
lambda.description: Number between 0 and 1 that determines the degree of diversity among the results, where 0 corresponds to maximum diversity and 1 to minimum diversity. Used only when the search type is MMR

chroma.label: Chroma
chroma.description: Upsert embedded data and perform similarity search using Chroma, an open-source vector database

collectionName.label: Collection Name
collectionName.description: Name of the collection to store vectors

topK.label: Top K
topK.description: Number of top results to fetch. Default to 4

faiss.description: Upsert embedded data and perform similarity search using FAISS, a library for efficient similarity search and clustering

topK.label: Top K
topK.description: Number of top results to fetch. Default to 4
